t11_features.title: Drag, drop, and share your files.
t11_features.text: Not just your messages, but all your files, images, PDFs, documents, and spreadsheets can be dropped right into Slack and shared with anyone you want. Add comments, star for later reference, and it’s all completely searchable. If you use any services like Google Drive, Dropbox, or Box, just paste the link and that document is immediately in sync and searchable too.

t11_features.title: Works everywhere you go
t11_features.text: Everything in Slack—messages, notifications, files, and all—is automatically indexed and archived so that you can have it at your fingertips whenever you want. Slack also indexes the content of every file so you can search within PDFs, Word documents, Google docs, and more. With one search box and a set of powerful search operators, you can slice and dice your way to that one message in your communication haystack.

t11_features.title: All your tools in one place.
t11_features.text: Connect all the tools you use to Slack and avoid all that constant switching between apps. Set up your integration so that you get all your notifications directly within Slack—from support requests, code check-ins, and error logs to sales leads—all of them searchable in one central archive. If you use any services like Google Drive, Dropbox, or Box, just paste the link and that document is immediately in sync and searchable too.

t8_features.text: Organize your team conversations in open channels. Make a channel for a project, a team, or everyone has a transparent view.

t8_features.title: Direct Messages
t8_features.text: Send messages directly to another and any person or to a small group of people for more focused conversations.

t8_features.text: Take a conversation from typing to face-to-face by starting a Slack voice or video call in any Channel or Direct Message.

settings.t1_lead_text: Slack for Teams is a single workspace for your small- to medium-sized company or team.

t1_pricing_plan.name: Free
t1_pricing_plan.features:
Searchable messages up to 10K
10 apps or service integrations
5GB total file storage for the team

t1_pricing_plan.name: Standard
t1_pricing_plan.features:
Unlimited searchable message archives
Unlimited apps and service integrations
10GB file storage per team member

t1_pricing_plan.name: Plus
t1_pricing_plan.features:
Everything in Free & Standard, and
SAML-based single sign-on (SSO)
Compliance Exports of all messages

settings.t1_lead_text: Drop us an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question in the following list.

t1_faqs.question: What is TheSaaS?
t1_faqs.answer: It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

t1_faqs.question: How long does it take?
t1_faqs.answer: It is a collection of layouts, design patterns, components, and guidelines for creating admin templates, SaaS startups, and complex dashboards.

t1_faqs.question: What payment services do you support?
Can I update my card details?
t1_faqs.answer: Yes. Go to the billing section of your dashboard and update your payment information.

t1_faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
t1_faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month.

t1_faqs.question: Can I get refund?
t1_faqs.answer: Unfortunately, not at this time! Please try our free plan for a while to make sure Helpato is what you want.

t1_faqs.question: What if I want to change plans?
t1_faqs.answer: It's quick and easy to switch between our different pricing plans from your dashboard.

t1_faqs.question: How long are your contracts?
t1_faqs.answer: You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your monthly account at any time with no further obligation.

settings.t2_lead_text: Send an email if you couldn't find an answer to your question here.
